content.question: Do you have access to a printer?
content.explanation: This service produces a completed divorce application form that you'll need to print and post to the court.
content.noPrinterNow: If you don't have access to a printer now, you can save it as a PDF when you're finished to print later.

screenHasPrinter.required: Select yes if you have access to a printer
screenHasPrinter.invalid: Select yes if you have access to a printer
